TopicTitle: Add Option to Revert to Old Mouse Cursor

Articles.Content: The new mouse cursor is something I find rather annoying, and I'm sure others share this opinion. Please add an option so we are able to use our default cursors in KSP, like we did pre 1.0.

To be honest, I didn't even notice it. A cursor is a cursor. If it points and is accurate enough to allow me to construct precise rockets (as this supposedly new one lets me do) then I have no complaint.

> 
> The new mouse cursor is something I find rather annoying, and I'm sure others share this opinion. Please add an option so we are able to use our default cursors in KSP, like we did pre 1.0.

I guess people will complain about anything...
Can someone please explain the problem? It changes color depending on if you left click or right click, which is pretty cool. And it looks better with the game compared to the usual mouse cursors.

> 
> It changes color depending on if you left click or right click, which is pretty cool.

Wut

See?! I literally had no idea! Unless you're joking... MUST TEST

> 
> Can someone please explain the problem? It changes color depending on if you left click or right click, which is pretty cool. And it looks better with the game compared to the usual mouse cursors.

It's actually the changing color that I don't like about it, it's kinda distracting. Other than that it's ok, but (due to the changing color) if there was an option to use the default system cursor I'd use that.

> 
> It's actually the changing color that I don't like about it, it's kinda distracting. Other than that it's ok, but (due to the changing color) if there was an option to use the default system cursor I'd use that.

The changing color adds more functionality. It indicates which mouse button you've clicked. How is it distracting? The colors aren't all that bright. If anything, the game should distract you.
